omnibus.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a radio or television programme consisting of several programmes that have previously been broadcast separately
omnibus.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a book containing several stories, especially by one writer, that have already been printed separately
omnibus.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Omnibus editions of novels tend to be too heavy to be read with comfort.
omnibus.translation[1].definitions[0].de: an omnibus law contains several different laws collected together
